title: Jaque’s Wesbite
text: This is my personal website. This website includes information about me including my education, experience, skills interests and prospective career goals!

title: About
text:
About me

I’m a graduate student in Watershed Science with a passion for hydrology, water quality, and sustainable resource management.
I have been a guide and river manager on the Cache La Poudre River for 6 years, which sparked my love for sustaining and restoring rivers.
My career goals are water resource management, hydrology, and river restoration
I enjoy rafting, splitboarding, and hiking
